#Generated by VisualGDB project wizard.
#Note: VisualGDB will automatically update this file when you add new sources to the project.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.7)
project(DesktopRaspi32)
set(LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES "")

set(CMAKE_INCLUDE_CURRENT_DIR ON)
set(CMAKE_AUTOMOC ON)
set(CMAKE_AUTOUIC ON)
set(CMAKE_AUTORCC ON)
find_package(Qt6 COMPONENTS Core Widgets Network Sql REQUIRED)

add_executable(DesktopRaspi32 DesktopRaspi32.cpp MainWindow.cpp MainWindow.ui Udp.cpp Udp_aulaw.cpp Udp_call_decoding.cpp Udp_checksum.cpp Udp_pressPtt.cpp Udp_rcp.cpp Udp_rcp_conn.cpp Udp_rtp_rx.cpp Udp_send_call_report.cpp DataBase.cpp messages_hm785.cpp SettingsReader.cpp Sound.cpp DataBase.h MainWindow.h messages_hm785.h SettingsReader.h Sound.h Udp.h MyThreadMic.h MyThreadHid.h Udp_rtp_tx.cpp Udp_rcp_tx.cpp MainWindow_ChanSelect.cpp MainWindow_Ptt.cpp)
target_link_libraries(DesktopRaspi32 Qt6::Widgets Qt6::Network Qt6::Sql "${LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES}")

target_link_libraries(DesktopRaspi32  -lhidapi-libusb)
target_link_libraries(DesktopRaspi32  -lasound)
